chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has a problem:
The phone won't charge wirelessly
Thanks,

Hello Javier: You will find the return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Please choose a location that is most convenient for you to send your package. You can find a list of drop-off points here: https://www.seur.com/en/busqueda-tiendas.do Return Preparation: 1. Check the instructions on how to return a product. 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your item. 3. Remove any protective cover or screen protector. 4. Package the item and its accessories following these guidelines. Packaging of the item: • The box must be strong and resilient. You should place the item inside the box securely so it doesn't move during transportation. • Attach the return label to the top of the box (you can also add an additional label inside to help identify the shipment if the original label becomes detached or damaged). • Take photos of the interior and exterior of your package before sending it. This will protect you in case the item is damaged during transportation. The return is ready for shipping! We'll notify you when it arrives. Best regards, Customer Service at Back Market, Customer Service at Back Market

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>repair<<.

We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button at the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected:
iCloud:
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud
Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

➜ Please provide a solution to the customer within the next (1) business day, or unfortunately we’ll have to refund the order, tomorrow at morning, according to the Back Market Quality Charter.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Linda Back Market customer Care.

Dear Backcare, 

Thank you. We are still processing the device. Will update you soon once we finish checking the device. Thank you.

Regards, 
KW

Dear ecomobile

I hope you're doing well.

We will proceed with the refund.

Thanks for your help.

Regards,
Linda from the Back Care Team.
